item.title: An inconvenient truth
item.dc:creator: Xavier Damman
item.content:encoded:
The movie is just right now in theater in Belgium and you should watch it. I saw it in the plane from Hong Kong to London one month ago and it's very interesting.
For sure we can criticize the movie for many points such as - This is very an american movie: they emphasize the principal character (Al Gore) a bit too much. They like glorifying people, for their proudness. - Every 5 minutes you get an ad for Apple Computers :-D
but these flaws just fade away compares to the importance of the topic. Al Gore is definitely a very good orator and at the end he's doing a very honorable job with that movie. <object height="350" width="425"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/5BjrOi4vF24" /> <param name="wmode" value="transparent" /> <embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/5BjrOi4vF24" wmode="transparent" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" height="350" width="425"></embed></object>
